Did you change the button id(s) to the button you want this to work for?

item.title: [P.I] how do i add the normal modern teleports?!
item.dc:creator: @deathscape1993 deathscape1993
item.description:
@deathscape1993 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:2, topic:422753”] case 51031://annakarl if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,2) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(565,2)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3289, 3887, 0, "ancient"); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),2); c.getItems().deleteItem(565,c.getItems().getItemSlot(565),2); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell."); } break;
Just change the item numbers:

(c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,2) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(565,2)) And

c.getItems().deleteItem(565,c.getItems().getItemSlot(565),2); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),2);

The coords:3289, 3887, 0

Whether it’s modern, ancient, or lunar teleport:"ancient"

And last, the button id:

This doesn’t include the magic level required which is easy to add.[/quote]

didnt work

Read full topic
item.source: [P.I] how do i add the normal modern teleports?!

item.title: [P.I] how do i add the normal modern teleports?!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

In ClickingButtons.java.

case 51031://annakarl if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,2) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(565,2)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3289, 3887, 0, "ancient"); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),2); c.getItems().deleteItem(565,c.getItems().getItemSlot(565),2); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell."); } break;
Just change the item numbers:

(c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,2) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(565,2)) And

c.getItems().deleteItem(565,c.getItems().getItemSlot(565),2); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),2);

The coords:3289, 3887, 0

Whether it’s modern, ancient, or lunar teleport:"ancient"

And last, the button id:

This doesn’t include the magic level required which is easy to add.

Read full topic
item.source: [P.I] how do i add the normal modern teleports?!
